data.title: Early Round Info Dart for Tree From B Site Tower
data.description: Use this dart for information at Tree and a bit of Attacker's Spawn, you can use this to enable any of your teammates looking to peek from B Main.

data.title: Mid Round Info Dart for Attacker Spawn From Sands
data.description: Here's a strong, info dart lineup you can use in the middle of the round to gain information on Attacker's rotations.

data.title: Start Round Info Dart for Outside A Main From Rafters
data.description: Use this dart at the start of the round to gain information on any Attackers looking to take A Main control.

data.title: Start Round Arcade Info Dart From Barrier
data.description: Use this line up at the start of the round for quick information at Arcade.

data.title: Spam Dart Through Door for A Main From Sands
data.description: Follow this video to perform a play towards A Main, or to spam Attackers through the door without opening it.

data.title: B Link To B Tower Recon Bolt
data.description: This quick and easy Recon Bolt lands in B Tower, and scans some of the inside of B Tower, as well as much of the Spike plant zone on B Site.
